Take up a hobby
Go outside for a walk

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d53c1f636872502d1a0000#post_54d53c1f636872502d1a0000
Do a thing
Do art
Write stories
Learn programming
Play vidya 
Read a book
read a _sexy_ book
Touch a butt (with permission of course)

Not that we don't want you here but you need to expand your horizons. I had the exact same thing happening to me a couple years back and I was really depressed. There were other thing going on at the time but being cooped up in my room doing nothing all the time certainly didn't help.
